text.section: As authorized by the Governor, the Special Secretary may create an Advisory Committee on Black Males to assist and advise the Office in developing recommendations in accordance with subsection (a) of this section.

The Office shall submit its findings and recommendations in accordance with this section to the Governor and, subject to § 2-1246 of this article, the General Assembly on or before January 1, 1995 and annually thereafter.
